From: Robin Kirkman <robin@...>

Nearing the southern tip of Africa, VorbIss began to pick up faint traces of 
radio communication. He was certain there was a robot camp or base nearby, 
but had no idea who they were. 

Nor, he concided, would he recognize them even if the signals were stronger; 
Without his old memories, VorbIss was essentially free for the taking to 
whoever wanted him to ally with them.
--robin

On Tuesday 21 August 2001 01:38, Robin Kirkman wrote:
> Recieving no reply, VorbIss transformed to beast mode, and started running
> south, heading unwittingly toward the maximal base.
